# `bbva-clip-product`

## `default`

####   `SHADOW DOM - Structure test`

```html
<span class="sr-only">
  <slot>
  </slot>
</span>
<div
  aria-hidden="true"
  class="bg"
>
  <div class="item">
  </div>
</div>

```

## `minimum with clip box`

####   `SHADOW DOM - Structure test`

```html
<span class="sr-only">
  <slot>
  </slot>
</span>
<div
  aria-hidden="true"
  class="bg"
>
  <div class="avatar">
    <bbva-clip-box
      class="bitone"
      has-i18n=""
      size="large"
      style="--bbva-clip-box-bg-color:#7C6AC7;"
    >
    </bbva-clip-box>
  </div>
</div>

```

```html
  aria-hidden="true"
  class="bg"
>
```

```html
    >
    </bbva-clip-box>
  </div>
</div>

```

####   `SHADOW DOM with item right`

```html
<span class="sr-only">
  <slot>
  </slot>
</span>
<div
  aria-hidden="true"
  class="bg"
>
  <div class="item">
  </div>
```
